info.headline: Flood Warning issued August 18 at 8:16PM CDT until August 21 at 1:36PM CDT by NWS La Crosse WI
info.description:
...The National Weather Service in La Crosse WI has issued a Flood Warning for the following rivers in Wisconsin...
Kickapoo River at Viola affecting Vernon and Richland Counties.
Kickapoo River at Readstown affecting Vernon County.
* WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast.
* WHERE...Kickapoo River at Readstown.
* WHEN...From Tuesday afternoon to early Thursday afternoon.
* IMPACTS...At 12.0 feet, The park along the river experiences significant flooding.
* ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:59 PM CDT Monday the stage was 5.3 feet. - Bankfull stage is 10.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 12.0 feet Wednesday morning. It will then fall below flood stage early Thursday morning. - Flood stage is 11.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 11.4 feet on 06/02/2014. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction:
Turn around, don't drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
Additional river and weather information is available at www.weather.gov/lacrosse.
The next statement will be issued Tuesday morning by 830 AM CDT.

parameter.value: FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT FROM TUESDAY AFTERNOON TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON
